long_description: Shaped so your hand stays relaxed, the Nathan VaporShot HandHeld water bottle will help you stay hydrated on long runs. 11 fl. oz. plastic bottle is shaped to fit comfortably in your hand while you run. Push/pull cap design is easy to operate without your hands. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. The Nathan VaporShot HandHeld water bottle has an airy mesh strap that keeps the back of you hand cool on hot days.
short_description: Shaped so your hand stays relaxed, the Nathan VaporShot HandHeld water bottle will help you stay hydrated on long runs.
